remarks: Lemma for ~ axsegcon .  Show that the scaling constant from ~ axsegconlem7 produces the betweenness condition for ` A ` , ` B ` and ` F ` .  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 21-Sep-2013.)
statement:
axsegconlem2.1 $e |- S = sum_ p e. ( 1 ... N ) ( ( ( A ` p ) - ( B ` p ) ) ^ 2 ) $.
axsegconlem7.2 $e |- T = sum_ p e. ( 1 ... N ) ( ( ( C ` p ) - ( D ` p ) ) ^ 2 ) $.
axsegconlem8.3 $e |- F = ( k e. ( 1 ... N ) |-> ( ( ( ( ( sqrt ` S ) + ( sqrt ` T ) ) x. ( B ` k ) ) - ( ( sqrt ` T ) x. ( A ` k ) ) ) / ( sqrt ` S ) ) ) $.
axsegconlem10 $p |- ( ( ( A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) /\ A =/= B ) /\ ( C e. ( EE ` N ) /\ D e. ( EE ` N ) ) ) -> A. i e. ( 1 ... N ) ( B ` i ) = ( ( ( 1 - ( ( sqrt ` S ) / ( ( sqrt ` S ) + ( sqrt ` T ) ) ) ) x. ( A ` i ) ) + ( ( ( sqrt ` S ) / ( ( sqrt ` S ) + ( sqrt ` T ) ) ) x. ( F ` i ) ) ) ) $.
$d A i k $.
$d A i p $.
$d B i k $.
$d B i p $.
$d C i k $.
$d C i p $.
$d D i k $.
$d D i p $.
$d N i k $.
$d N i p $.
$d S i k $.
$d T i k $.
